title: Today one of the oldest champions in league passed away.
body:
https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/4/41/Pantheon_Render.png/revision/latest?cb=20190112192109

This magnificent bastard was the one champion i could play game after game after game in S4 -> S7 and it never got old. I may not have climbed with him, However i will never forget the times we spent together. Together we memed about you becoming a baker and together we saw that dream come to fruition. However you never were the same after S7 and we spent less and less time together, Eventually i moved on to other's who could satiate my needs & would go to fill my life for the next couple of years,{{champion:17}} .

It's sad to see you go but with no changes year after year after year something had to be done & while it pains me to see you go entirely i know you'd sleep well knowing the legacy you leave behind will spawn a new era for pantheon players everywhere.
Sleep well old friend.

I'll never forget the time we spent together in silver {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
